summary: A modified SweetFX configuration to simulate most of the effects seen in a professionally configured ENB.
descriptionHtml:
A modified SweetFX 1.5.1 configuration to simulate most of the effects seen in a professionally configured ENB. Like the config? Drop me a comment and an endorsement, otherwise how else will I know if people like this mod? xD

You should also try combining this mod with others for the best ENB-like experience, I recommend you try:

Carpetbulge's "Mitigate HDR Eye Adaptation and disable Bloom" http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31593/

Anamorfus' "Enhanced Lights and FX" http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?

Arindel's "Surreal Lighting" http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50753

Don't forget to endorse them.
author: Zovio
